1384230.name: Touch Typing Home Row Speed Grinder - USA American Skin
1384230.description:
This DLC is a Downloadable USA America Skin for the Onscreen Keyboard instead of the default Color Coded Skin, the correct finger lights up when a key is pressed in accordance with the "Home Row" Touch Typing Method, helping a user remember which finger to use for the appropriate keys.
This Keyboard is mainly designed for Professional Touch Typists, because there are no letter imprints on the Onscreen Keyboard. Fireworks go off when a vowel keystroke is pressed.
--

I invite all to compete with me. ---> "Visit the Website" on the right side of this page to go to the Discord. Beating me will be no easy task tho, since I am within the top 0.2% in the world as far as speed is concerned.
1384230.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
